de.Lathanael.BinaryFileDB.BaseClass
Class IndexEntry

java.lang.Object
  de.Lathanael.BinaryFileDB.BaseClass.IndexEntry

public class IndexEntry
extends Object

IndexEntry object for the DB-file index header

Author:
Lathanael (aka Philippe Leipold)

Field Summary
protected  int dataCapacity
          Number of bytes of data that this record can hold (4 bytes).
protected  int dataCount
          Actual number of bytes of data held in this record (4 bytes).
protected  long dataPointer
          File pointer to the first byte of record data (8 bytes).
protected  int indexPosition
          Indicates this entry's position in the file index.
protected  String key
          The key used to refer to this index entry
protected  int maxKeyLength
          The maximum length allowed for a key

          Empty constructor

          Creates a new IndexEntry object

IndexEntry

protected IndexEntry(long dataPointer,
                     int dataCapacity,
                     String key,
                     int maxKeyLength)
Creates a new IndexEntry object

Parameters:
dataPointer - - Where in the file is the data located.
dataCapacity - - The maximum capacity for this entry
key - - The key with which this entry can be read
maxKeyLength - - The maximum KeyLength allowed by the RecordsFile

split

protected IndexEntry split(String key)
                    throws RecordsFileException
Returns a new index entry which occupies the free space of this entry. Shrinks this entries size by the size of its free space.

Throws:
RecordsFileException
